entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:40 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of hail this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of hail early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
